field.name: Code of Conduct at Fa Hong
field.default_value:
1) Observe Five Precepts: Refrain from killing living beings including animals and insects; practice celibacy during the retreat; refrain from smoking and taking alcohol.
2) Respect and follow the instructions given by the teacher.
3) Observe Noble Silence. Speak to the staff quietly if you need assistance. All mobile phones should be turned off. Phone calls are allowed only for emergencies. No music.
4) Follow the timetable, be considerate and keep the retreat site clean and tidy.
5) Dress should be simple, modest, and comfortable. Tight, transparent, revealing clothing should not be worn. Do not wear make-ups, perfume and jewelry.
6) If you feel sick or need help, please inform the staff right away.
7) Vegetarian meals include breakfast, lunch and drinks will be provided as indicated on the daily schedule. No other food should be taken in any other time except for health reasons
8) A meditator should not leave the retreat without informing the staff.

view.content:
{"reg_email":"141","reg_username":"","reg_password":"","reg_first_name":"","reg_last_name":"145","reg_display_name":"145","reg_role":"administrator","reg_avatar":"","reg_usermeta":[{"meta_name":"language","field_id":"148"},{"meta_name":"sex","field_id":"146"},{"meta_name":"age","field_id":"147"},{"meta_name":"mobile","field_id":"154"},{"meta_name":"phone","field_id":"155"},{"meta_name":"address","field_id":""},{"meta_name":"have_meditation_experience","field_id":"149"},{"meta_name":"meditation_history","field_id":"150"},{"meta_name":"meditation_years","field_id":"151"},{"meta_name":"have_health_issues","field_id":"167"},{"meta_name":"health_issues_infos","field_id":"168"},{"meta_name":"have_spirit_issues","field_id":"169"},{"meta_name":"spirit_issues_infos","field_id":"170"},{"meta_name":"have_sleep_issues","field_id":"171"},{"meta_name":"sleep_issues_infos","field_id":"172"},{"meta_name":"have_allergies_issues","field_id":"173"},{"meta_name":"allergies_issues_infos","field_id":"174"},{"meta_name":"contact_name","field_id":"178"},{"meta_name":"contact_phone","field_id":"179"},{"meta_name":"contact_relation","field_id":"180"},{"meta_name":"update_details","field_id":"143"}],"reg_redirect":"","reg_email_from":"HKIMS Webmaster","reg_email_sender":"hkims.webmaster@gmail.com","reg_email_subject":"[sitename] Your username and password for future application","reg_email_msg":"For English, please scroll below,


多謝您填寫申請表格并選擇儲存您的資料以便將來重複使用。以後填寫報名表時，請輸入您的用戶名稱及密碼如下後，按"載入個人資料"鍵即可。

用戶名: [username]
密碼: [password]

--

Dear meditator,

thank you for your application and for storing your information on our system.
Next time you apply for a retreat you can pre-fill the fields using the stored information. In order to do so, you will need to use the username and password below after clicking the "Load profile" link.

Username: [username]
Password: [password]

With metta,
HKIMS","event":["create"],"conditions":{"send_stop":"send","any_all":"any","0":{"hide_field":"143","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Yes"}}}

view.title: Response to registrant
view.content:
{"email_to":"[141]","cc":"","bcc":"","reply_to":"","from":"[sitename] <[admin_email]>","email_subject":"Your request to apply for our retreat","email_message":"For english, please scroll down,

多谢您報名參加是次禪修活動!
[frm-field-value field_id=124 entry=[186]]

您的申請狀態: [201]

我們將於活動前一週電郵通知您
是否錄取。如需提前知道申請結果，請電郵通知我們。

如果您不能参加這次活動，請填寫取消通知。我們可以將空位留給候補人仕! 多謝您的理解及支持!

取消參加: https://hkims.org/cancel-retreat-registration/?applicant=[141]&ref=[204]&eid=[id]&ft=f&ret=[186]

--

Thank you for submitting your application for:
[frm-field-value field_id=123 entry=[186]]

Currently, the status of your application is: [201]

We will confirm your application one week before the retreat starts by email. Should you need earlier notice, please let us know.



If you change your mind or can't make it anymore, please do cancel your registration by clicking the following link and filling the form that will loads. This way, we can give the space to people on the wait list. Thank you for your understanding.

Cancellation link: https://hkims.org/en/cancel-retreat-registration/?applicant=[141]&ref=[204]&eid=[id]&ft=f&ret=[186]

Warmly,
HKIMS","plain_text":"1","event":["create"],"conditions":{"send_stop":"send","any_all":"any"}}

多谢您報名參加是次禪修活動!

[frm-field-value field_id=124 entry=[249]]

如果您不能参加這次活動，請填寫取消通知。我們可以將空位留給候補人仕! 多謝您的理解及支持!
取消參加: https://hkims.org/cancel-retreat-registration/?applicant=[205]&ref=[251]&eid=[id]&ft=s&ret=[186]

--

Thank you for applying for the retreat:

[frm-field-value field_id=123 entry=[249]]

If you change your mind or cannot make it anymore, please use let us know by clicking the following link and filling the cancellation form:

Warmly,

 多謝您填寫申請表格并選擇儲存您的資料以便將來重複使用。以後填寫報名表時，請 輸入您的用戶名稱及密碼如下後，按"載入個人資料"鍵即可。

 用戶名: [username]

 Dear meditator,

 Next time you apply for a retreat you can pre-fill the fields using the stored information. In order to do so, you will need to use the username and password below after clicking the "Load profile" link.
